OnPremStack/OnPremLogin/Instance: sudo tc qdisc del dev ens5 root
sudo tc qdisc add dev ens5 root handle 1: prio
sudo tc qdisc add dev ens5 parent 1:3 handle 10: netem delay 10.0ms 0.0ms
sudo tc qdisc add dev ens5 parent 10:1 handle 11: tbf rate 6mbit burst 32kbit latency 10ms
sudo tc filter add dev ens5 protocol ip parent 1:0 prio 3 handle 1 fw flowid 1:3
OnPremStack/OnPremWorker00/Instance: sudo tc qdisc del dev ens5 root
CloudStack/CloudNode00/Instance: sudo tc qdisc del dev ens5 root
sudo tc qdisc add dev ens5 root handle 1: prio
sudo tc qdisc add dev ens5 parent 1:3 handle 10: netem delay 10.0ms 0.0ms
sudo tc qdisc add dev ens5 parent 10:1 handle 11: tbf rate 1000mbit burst 32kbit latency 10ms
sudo tc filter add dev ens5 protocol ip parent 1:0 prio 3 handle 1 fw flowid 1:3
